headline: Tracking Dan Loeb's Third Point Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Dan Loeb's Third Point 13F reveals portfolio shifts, new stakes, and top holdings. Portfolio value slightly increased to $7.44B. Read more on the portfolio here.

headline: $20 Billion Club: For The Largest Corporate DB Plans, Maximizing Returns Is Not The Goal
summary: Russell Investments expects the trend toward liability-hedging fixed income to persist as funded status inches upward. We also expect ongoing interest in alternative asset classes.
